group_1.textLeft: You get into a fight with that girl every@time you run into her.
I can't believe you'd behave that way@inside a Labyrinth of all places.

group_1.textRight: I can't help it! Whenever I see her,@I just wanna...GRRR! Rip 'er to shreds!

group_1.textLeft: Because you're about the same age?

group_1.textRight: Hey, I'm older than her! My birthday's@earlier, okay?!
She acts like the biggest brat! I can't@believe how immature she is!

group_1.textLeft: Haha, yeah, if you guys fought about@immaturity, I'm not sure who'd win.

group_1.textRight: It's okay if you or Konoha beat me.
But I can't stand losin' to Felicia!
I sure as hell CANNOT lose to her!@Never, never, never!

group_1.textLeft: The more you escalate this argument with@her, the harder it'll be to hunt Witches.

group_1.textRight: All I gotta do is show Felicia once and@for all that I'm the best!
Come on, Konoha. Let's just leave them@to it.
We can always step in if things get too@out of control.

group_1.textLeft: Are you sure you can handle them when@they're both at full blast?

group_1.textRight: So long as they keep themselves in check@there shouldn't be a problem.
It's not like you'll stop just because we@told you to, right, Ayame?

group_1.textLeft: You got it, Hazuki! You understand me@the best!
Hazuki! What kind of advice is that?

group_1.textRight: If you really want to, just do it. But@make sure you don't get carried away!

group_1.textLeft: I got permission from Konoha and Hazuki!
What should I do the next time I run into@that Felicia...

group_1.textRight: [chara:302601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Now, listen here, Ayame! I didn't give you@permission to fight!
